name: AWS Examples
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p ~/.aws && if [ -n "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" ] && [ -n "$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY" ]; then aws configure set aws_access_key_id "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key "$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY" && [ -n "$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION" ] && aws configure set region "$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION"; fi && aws configure set cli_auto_prompt on-partial || true
